post.body: Oh that sounds good.
Happy Thursday to you.
How mysterious of you!
Big fan of that show. Peter Krause, yumm!
Really, the songs are good? He is talented but can annoy me sometimes..but I trust your review.
Oh really.. with his baby or without?
don't forget to wrap mine. ;)
Are you still on the East Coast? Do u ever come do your work in NYC?
I agree, not a fan of Wordpress
Nice!Something very yummy to drink..
Oh what did men do now? Do tell...
LOL! Ah Ha..can't blame a girl for tryin'.
Are you sure it's the cat or are you imagining things? LOL..She could be telling u what she wants for Xmas
So lovely to see you last night. Can't wait for the cupcakes on Thursday. YUMMERS!
So u liked Australia? Haven't heard much about it...
Thanks for the info..
Nice..red wine is always such a good thing..
And why are u cooking chicken at midnight?
Always put latin boy in for dancing..;)
LOL! Yes you are...
She is knows times r hard, she wants to make sure Santa stops by her house this year. LOL
Sounds like a good idea to me...
How do you loose you wine. Your keys maybe, but wine!! Oy vey..LOL!
I so agree.. so is no Etta James...
Excuse me? Did you move or are you moving to NYC? Do tell..
Oh have fun..I'm at She's Geeky so I am missing the dinner
30 years..no wonder he is emotional. Damn!
Break a leg diva..
I feel like it's slowing down too!
Now that sounds good!
There's always today!
Who says..; )
You go girl!
You are making me hungry..why did you not invite me to dinner? I mean really delish food you have going on.
Pootie Tang oh snap!
Girl, yes..I'm surprised too. To each it's own...
She should block you..cheating. LOL!
Me too and it feels so good!
Oh I hear Slumdog is a really good movie..report back. Enjoy!
It is? Cool..
You leave Liza Minelli alone. How dare u? LOL!
So true..I need to check out those shows..
It was..classy. There are so many events now for women biz owners, it was nice to be at one that was not about bs!
Oh that sounds good, blue cheese pizza, how you give me ideas Funky Brown! ;)
Great Kirtsy giveaway! ;)
He has a fragrance..how does it smell?
Thanks! You too..
Right..grrl it is cold outside. Brr!
I can only imagine what u r up to Grace for u to realize ham hocks have been missing in your life. LOL!
Asking myself the same thing..
I thought I was the only one left who hadn't seen it
Rachael Ray makes jewelry..can I handle that? Are there EVOO charms..
I agree with both of those delicious choices!
Nothing wrong with that.so do I!
I would say so..cause girl if u r eating lip gel it's time 4 a meal. LOL!
MAZAL TOV!
It's a sign of something..no wonder some woman are still trying to rock open toed shoes this season
Really? JP Morgan..wow.
LOL! And now that you have let all of us in NYC know that you are naked in your hotel room, we are gonna spread the word.
Do you have a little crush on Patrick Dempsey?
Then it will!
Nice!
I missed it. what happened..I love Chuck/Blaire..doesn't sounds like anything good happened.
Me too..maybe a pumpkin one
Hang in there..
Tony D's haven't been there in ages... I am always up early on Sat so I will see you on WNBC!
Thx! And was a pleasure to meet you..for those of u who like beautiful jewerly Payson Cooper is on point!
Oh, you only give shout outs to people in the BK. What is that about? LOL ;)
But of course, you are a woman on the rise..
Hang in there, this shall pass. Have a GREAT weekend!! :) You rock..
Wait, what did she do?
Now a weekend retreat would be so fab right now..(sigh)
Back at you!
Hmm..eggnog coffee cake. Not a fan of eggnog, but that sounds quite good.
True! She was the world's best pinup. RIP Bettie Page.
Santacon is tomorrow..you going? I love seeing all the Santas!
What? How could he tell anyone that..that is something he needs to keep to himself!
Oh shit is right. It didn't sound like she was doing good..Betty Paige will be missed.
Now that sounds good!
LOL!
YUM!
And now they are making me hungry..
Booze recipes always good, but homemade gifts great idea since Xmas, Chanukah, Kwanzaa coming up & peeps r broke!
I so understand what you mean..
LOL! I read wrong...but $300 for kallah is no better..obviously my mind is on challah...
$300 bucks for challah baking? Can I get an oy vey!
That is impressive...lunch any good?
Now that sounds good! ;)
Rome! Oh how nice..wish I was there. :)
nice!
Sell it on Ebay! ;)
LOL!
Hey! I just got that fresh tweet! LOL It's all good..thought it was funny..Peace
Seriously? At least she is getting her name back in the paper
And a Merry Xmas to you!
Thanks! Same to you..
Does sound nice! Happy Holidays to you...
You make curtains...oh make me some.
Yes, girl...relax. Happy Chanukah diva!
Oh really and what kind of cookies? ;)
And you should be nervous...
Nice! ;)
So true!
Yep..it just stopped working...glad it's back..
It is about time..They use to have..glad it's back!
Good morning on this Teriffic Thursday! Sending love & light your way.
Home. Victoria Secret's show, Usher more exciting than models at moment. I catwalk better than some of them...
Just left In Good Company with Judith, looking at some hot boots then going home
At the In Good Company Party talking to Rebecca from Maxim (www.maximny.com) and E.B. Moss from Moss Apeal
Just walked passed Melanie Griffith on West 24th b/w 6th & 7th Ave. No Antonio was not w/ her. DAMN!
It wans Cheez Its...
Watching Fraiser..
What is happening around Rockefeller Elmo, Black Santa, Micky & Minnie Mouse...I am scared. The tourist love this scary stuff.
Dina Kaplan invited me 2 BlipTv holiday party..She's Geeky done 4 night..goin home 2chill..my ass is TIRED! Got movie & wine waiting 4 me.
At She's Geeky...Dina Kaplan is here from BlipTv..love her
feeling tired..went to an event or two every night this week. But onward I go to She's Geeky @ Microsoft.
On my way to the FCW Society Holiday party, cause yes I am a F*CKIN COOL WOMAN!
Gonna make me some pancakes and scrambled eggs with colby jack cheese..wish I had grits but lazy & it's cold. Gonna have w/ hot cocoa. YUM!
Watching Joel Osteen and having vanilla almond coffee
Gonna get some sleep...
Explaining to someone why I don't go home w/ a man the same night I meet one. Oh hell no! U r the killer until u prove otherwise..
FCW Society (F*CKING COOL WOMEN SOCIETY): Hey Diva,If you are going to be in NYC on Sunday..come by the FC.. http://tinyurl.com/568zqo
Spiced Rum Punch & Curried Winter Squash: My sassy single client is having a holiday party for singles. Sh.. http://tinyurl.com/5rezcb
Home sitting on couch drinking merlot..reflecting on week, it was a great week for my business. Oh my luscious life...
Home from a hot event. Champagne with sugar & cinnamon, celebrity, goodie bag, makeover, massage.. was a luscious night.
At Savor the Success holiday party
Just walked by Brooke Leighton from Gossip Girl in Tribeca..and I was upset I am missing the show tonight!
Thinking that my mom is the funniest person I know, esp when she talks about baby mama drama.
Good mornin'..it's momentum Monday. Step up your game a notch and you will bloom where you are planted. Much love to you..
Watchin' Sex & the City (movie) & laying on the couch...(sigh)
Just got home. Makin myself a burger..gonna then relax..
Cool..Cheers!
Lessons in Lusciousness: Tis The Season..: Tis the season to be...? What would you fill in the blank with? Durin.. http://tinyurl.com/5qsczm
It's "what you say" Wednesday! There is power in words. Speak with positivity. Give compliments instead of complaints. U will feel FANTASTIC
Having a sugar plum martini made with Pearl plum vodka...so good..impressive event!
At Desiron in Tribeca for an event for The Nest
Pondering..still have feelings for someone that I can't seem to get over. Not sure why, there is a lesson in it somewhere
Trying to figure out how my schedule has gotten so crazy..but now I have one less place to be in tonight.
scheduling "Unleash Your Lusciousness" class & "What is the Luscious Life" teleseminar.2009 is gonna b a busy & sexy year us single gals!
It's frisky Friday, remember 2 stay playful & not take yrself 2 seriously. Then u don't sweat the small stuff, & it really is small stuff.
Laying down listening to Coltrane and Diana Krall thinking about life as the rain pitter patters on my window. I dig it..
Can't sleep..insomnia is working on me. May have to dance around my apartment to work of energy.
Home. Getting warm. Thinking!
Can't decide whether to go out or go home...
Was told that I am getting something bright & shiny from Tiffany's to play with for Chanukah. Didn't know he knew what Chanukah was..LOL!
It's tasty Tuesday! Eat something yummy like a hearty homemade soup or dangerous chocolate brownie. Yr tummy & tongue will do a happy dance!
Everything on CBS looks the same..it's Cold Case..no CSI..no some other murder show that look like the one that was just on..
Thinking it's time for hot chocolate...
About to do my show..The Luscious Life with Shoshi
Now on my way to Darbar for Xmas dinner in Manhattan
On my way to a Xmas party in Park Slope in Brooklyn
Tina Turner looks fab at 68! Maybe her secret is her younger blond boyfriend..
It's "totally a holiday" Thursday..whether u celebrate Xmas,Chanukah, or u r waiting 4 Kwanzaa..may your holidays be filled with much joy!
We are at Mardi Gras on Austin having the BEST mojitos and talking about men...
Karen is killing me.. we are at a boutique that is aweful and the sales woman is like The Nanny.
Gearing up to go for cocktails with Karen on Austin Street in Queens..

SistersTalk Radio:
Hey Divas!,
I was on SistersTalk Radio on Sunday! Check it out when you can. Happy Hol.. http://tinyurl.com/73ptvy
Good morning FABULOUS people! May your day be filled with all that is luscious..xoxo~S
